languages.text: {n}Мельком взглянув на {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g}, Паскаль презрительно бросает:{/n} "Священная логика нарушена. Твои вычисления иррациональны".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мельком взглянув на {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g}, Паскаль презрительно бросает:{/n} "Твои вычисления иррациональны. Они полны ошибок".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal casts a quick glance over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, and says with contempt,{/n} "The sacred logic is impaired. Your calculations are irrational."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal casts a quick glance over the data-slate and says with contempt,{/n} "Your calculations are irrational. They are riddled with errors."

languages.text: {n}パスカルは{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}に素早く視線をやり、軽蔑をにじませながら告げる。{/n}「あなたの計算は筋が通らない。間違いだらけです」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a quick glance over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, and says with contempt,{/n} "The sacred logic is impaired. Your calculations are irrational."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}に素早く視線をやり、軽蔑をにじませながら告げる。{/n}「あなたの計算は筋が通らない。間違いだらけです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡快速扫了一眼{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}，轻蔑地开了口。{/n}“你的计算是不合理的，不符合神圣逻辑。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a quick glance over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, and says with contempt,{/n} "The sacred logic is impaired. Your calculations are irrational."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡快速扫了一眼{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}，轻蔑地开了口。{/n}“你的计算是不合理的，充满了错误。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal wirft einen kurzen Blick auf den {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datablock{/g} und erklärt verächtlich:{/n} "Die heilige Logik ist gestört. Eure Berechnungen sind irrational."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a quick glance over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, and says with contempt,{/n} "The sacred logic is impaired. Your calculations are irrational."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal wirft einen kurzen Blick auf den {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datablock{/g} und sagt verächtlich:{/n} "Eure Berechnungen sind irrational. Sie sind voller Fehler."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après un bref regard à la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g}, Pasqal prend la parole d'un ton méprisant :{/n} « La logique sacrée a été altérée. Vos calculs sont irrationnels. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a quick glance over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, and says with contempt,{/n} "The sacred logic is impaired. Your calculations are irrational."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un bref regard à la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g}, Pasqal prend la parole d'un ton méprisant :{/n} « La logique sacrée a été altérée. Vos calculs sont irrationnels. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal echa un rápido vistazo a la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} y responde con desdén.{/n} «La lógica sagrada está dañada. Sus cálculos son irracionales».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a quick glance over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, and says with contempt,{/n} "The sacred logic is impaired. Your calculations are irrational."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal echa un rápido vistazo a la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} y responde con desdén.{/n} «Sus cálculos son irracionales. Están plagados de errores».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}databelaya{/g} hızlı bakış atıp hoşnutsuzluğunu ifade ediyor.{/n} "Kutsal mantık bozulmuş. Hesaplamaların irrasyonel."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a quick glance over the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, and says with contempt,{/n} "The sacred logic is impaired. Your calculations are irrational."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}databela{/g}ya hızlı bir bakış atıyor ve hoşnutsuzluğunu ifade ediyor:{/n} "Kutsal mantık bozulmuş. Hesaplamaların irrasyonel."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
